member.summary: This method resets the active component.

member.summary: Raises an event when the Value of the Name property is changed

member.name: M:ISSDT.CComponent.SetActive
member.summary: Sets this component as active component, i.e., it shows the resize boxes, the border, and its options.

member.name: M:ISSDT.CComponent.ResetActive
member.summary: Removes this component as active component, i.e., it removes the resize boxes, the border, and its options.

member.summary: Rotates a component around its center.

member.name: M:ISSDT.CComponent.ShowResizeBoxes
member.summary: Shows the six resize boxes around the component.

member.name: M:ISSDT.CComponent.HideResizeBoxes
member.summary: Hides the six resize boxes around the component.

member.summary: Resets the drag functionality.

member.summary: Drags the component around the canvas.

member.name: M:ISSDT.MComponentTypes.AddComponentsOfTypeToComboBox``1(System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox@)
member.summary: Adds all components on the canvas of a specific type to the item list of a combo box.
member.param: The combo box to add the components to.

member.name: M:ISSDT.MComponentTypes.AddComponentsOfTypeToComboBox``2(System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox@)
member.summary: Adds all components on the canvas of a specific type to the item list of a combo box. If the item already exists in the combobox, the original item is kept. If an item is in the combo box that does not exist on the canvas it is removed.
member.param: The combo box to add the components to.

member.name: M:ISSDT.MComponentTypes.AddComponentsOfTypeToComboBox``3(System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox@)
member.summary: Adds all components on the canvas of a specific type to the item list of a combo box. If the item already exists in the combobox, the original item is kept. If an item is in the combo box that does not exist on the canvas it is removed.
member.param: The combo box to add the components to.

member.summary: Adds items that are in the canvas, but not in the combo box and removes items that are not in the canvas, but are in the combo box.
member.param: The items in the combo box.

member.returns: True is the expression is valid, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ISSDT.MComponentTypes.VerifyExpressionTextBox(System.Windows.Forms.TextBox)
member.summary: Verifies whether the expression in a textbox is a valid expression. If it is, the backcolor will be set to white, otherwise to red.

member.name: M:ISSDT.MComponentTypes.VerifyNumericTextBox(System.Windows.Forms.TextBox)
member.summary: Verifies whether the numeric input in a textbox is valid (in the form "digit" or "digit.digit"). If it is, the backcolor will be set to white, otherwise to red.
